title: Easy ways to avoid the debt trap and secure your earnings - Free Press Journal
content: Easy ways to avoid the debt trap and secure your earnings  Free Press Journal
description: Many people spend their lives surviving on paycheck to paycheck, it is an unhealthy way of living that only breeds stress and anxiety. Though your monthly salary may be able to cover your daily expenses, financial emergencies of any kind can take a considerable toll on your financial health if you donâ€™t plan ahead.
